You are welcome:
Dear Customer,

Thank you for reaching out to Paysend Customer Support.

You are always welcome.

We are constantly evolving and doing our best to provide the best service possible and we appreciate you being a part of our community.

If you have any questions or need assistance with anything, please, do not hesitate to reach out to us.
We are always here to help you.

Thank you for using Paysend!
You are welcome (ver 2):
Dear Customer,

You are always welcome.

If you have any more questions, please contact us again at any time. We are here to assist you.

Thank you for choosing Paysend!
You are welcome (ver 3):
Dear Customer,

Thank you for reaching out to Paysend Customer Support.

It’s always a pleasure to hear from you.

We’re continually working to improve our services, and we’re grateful to have you as part of our community.

If you have any questions or need further assistance, please don’t hesitate to contact us. We’re always here to support you.

Thank you for choosing Paysend!
Apologize (ver 1): We apologize for the inconvenience this might have caused you.
Apologize (ver 2): We fully understand your disappointment and we are deeply sorry for the inconvenience.
Apologize (ver 3): We're truly sorry to hear about the inconvenience you experienced with our service.
Apologize (ver 4): We completely understand your frustration and we are deeply sorry for the distress this situation may have caused you.
Apologize + more questions + understandi:
We apologize for the inconvenience this might have caused you.

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out to us. We will be more than happy to help you.

Thank you for your understanding.
Better photos: We kindly ask you to provide us with better-quality photos of yourself holding the document. All the information displayed on your document should be clearly visible without any blurs or glares.
Wrap (ver 1):
Thank you for your patience.

Unfortunately, we are unable to process your request at this moment.
We will contact you via email as soon as we are able to address your request.

We apologize for any inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.
Wrap (ver 2):
Thank you for your patience.

Regrettably, we're unable to proceed with your request at this time.
We'll be sure to reach out to you via email once we're able to handle your request.

Please accept our sincere apologies for any inconvenience caused.

Thank you for your understanding.
Wrap (ver 3):
Thank you for your patience.

Unfortunately, we need more time to process your request. The chat will be closed and you will receive feedback from us via email.

Thank you for your understanding.
Phone number (ver 1):
We kindly ask you to specify the phone number associated with your Paysend account in international format.
It should begin with the "+" sign followed by the country code and the remaining digits of the phone number.
American hotline:
Our phone support for American customers is available Monday to Friday from 10 am to 6 pm Eastern time.
You can reach us at 1-(844) 9388840 during these hours.

Additionally, our live chat and email support are available 24/7 for your convenience.
No hotline:
Unfortunately, we're unable to offer phone call support in your region at this time.
However, we're here to assist you promptly via email or live chat, which are available 24/7 for your convenience.

1card2accs numbers:
Can you please provide us with the phone number of the Paysend account where the bank card was used before and the phone number of the Paysend account you are trying to use this card on?

This will help us assist you in the best way possible.

Thank you in advance.
1card2acc macro:
According to our Terms & Conditions, a user can have only one Paysend account and is expected to use cards issued in their own name. We need to verify that you are the owner of the card before we can link the card to your new account. Please provide the following data in reply to this message:

1) a current photo of your face (selfie) with any one of the documents below:

• Passport;
• ID (both sides of the document);
• Full driving licence (non-provisional type).

All information in the document should be legible.
All edges and corners of your document should be entirely visible.

2) a photo of the bank card that you are trying to use for Paysend transactions. The cardholder’s name, the first 6 and last 4 digits of the card number and its expiry date should be clearly visible.

If the card is virtual, please send us a bank statement, where we will see: the card number, your name, and payments.

Please note that you will not be able to use this card with any other account.

Please make sure that the subject of this correspondence is unchanged.

Thank you for your cooperation!
1card2acc macro (RU):
Согласно нашим Правилам и условиям, пользователь может иметь только один счет Paysend и должен использовать карты, выпущенные на его собственное имя. Нам необходимо подтвердить, что вы являетесь владельцем карты, прежде чем мы сможем привязать ее к вашему новому счету. Пожалуйста, предоставьте следующие данные в ответ на это сообщение:

1) актуальную фотографию вашего лица (selfie) с любым из перечисленных ниже документов:

- паспорт;
- удостоверение личности (обе стороны документа);
- полное водительское удостоверение (непропорционального типа).

Вся информация в документе должна быть разборчивой.
Все края и углы документа должны быть полностью видны.

2) фотографию банковской карты, которую вы хотите использовать для операций Paysend. Имя владельца карты, первые 6 и последние 4 цифры номера карты и срок ее действия должны быть хорошо видны.

Если карта виртуальная, пришлите нам выписку из банка, где будут видны: номер карты, ваше имя и платежи.

Примите во внимание, что вы не сможете использовать эту карту с любым другим счетом.

Пожалуйста, убедитесь, что тема этой корреспонденции не изменилась.

Благодарим вас за сотрудничество!
Set passcode:
To set the passcode on your app please log into your Paysend account and go to Security options.
You can find these options by clicking on the profile icon in the upper right corner of the main page.

In the Security options, you will see the option "Set passcode".
You can use this option to enter your 4-digit passcode instead of your phone number to log into your Paysend account.
Limits increased (ver 1):
Your account has been verified and as a result, your limits have been increased. You are now able to send up to [AMOUNT] by the end of the [DATE].
After the [DATE], your sending limit will once again reset to [AMOUNT].
Limits increased (ver 2):
Your account has already been verified and as a result, your limits have been increased. You are now able to send up to [AMOUNT] by the end of the [DATE]. It's worth noting that you have already sent [SENT], which means that you can still send up to [REST].
After the [DATE], your sending limit will once again reset to [AMOUNT].
Limits increased (ver 3):
I can confirm that your limit has already been increased to [AMOUNT] per 3 months.
This limit will be renewed on the [DATE].
Limits increased (ver 4):
I can confirm that your limit has already been increased to [AMOUNT] per 3 months.
You have already used [SENT] of this limit, wich leaves you with [REST] till the end of [DATE] when this limit will be renewed.

Number change-lost access (chat):
Hello!

Thank you for contacting us.

If you have lost access to your old phone number linked to your Paysend account we can change with the new one.

First, please ensure that both the old and new phone numbers belong to the same country.

To change your phone number, I will need the following details from you:
• Old and new phone numbers in international format;
• A current photo of your face (selfie) with your ID document (if the document is double-sided, please send selfies with both sides);
• Email address or residential address associated with the original account.

Once you provide these details, we’ll happily make the change.

Phone number change-lost access (email):
Dear Customer,

Thank you for reaching out to Paysend Customer Support.

If you have lost access to your old phone number linked to your Paysend account we can change with the new one.

First, please ensure that both the old and new phone numbers belong to the same country.

To change your phone number, I will need the following details from you:
• Old and new phone numbers in international format;
• A current photo of your face (selfie) with your ID document (if the document is double-sided, please send selfies with both sides);
• Email address or residential address associated with the original account.

Once you provide these details, we’ll happily make the change.
OTP not delivered (chat):
Thank you for your response.
 
The actual absence of messages on your phone with a positive delivery status is possible mainly in the following cases:
- A phone filter has been triggered, blocking messages from a specific sender;
- You have activated an operator service that blocks commercial traffic.
 
We can recommend you:
- check your device for failures, reboot it,
- clear the device memory from obsolete messages, reboot it,
- check blacklists and spam filters of the device,
- remove third-party software for working with SMS installed on the device,
- in the case of a Multi-SIM device, make sure that this SIM card is active,
- if necessary, update the system software, or reset the device to factory settings,
- test the reception of messages by moving the SIM card to another, known to be working device.
 
If you have any other questions, feel free to contact us again.

Thank you for your understanding.
OTP not delivered (email):
Dear Customer,

Thank you for your response.
 
The actual absence of messages on your phone with a positive delivery status is possible mainly in the following cases:
- A phone filter has been triggered, blocking messages from a specific sender;
- You have activated an operator service that blocks commercial traffic.
 
We can recommend you:
- check your device for failures, reboot it,
- clear the device memory from obsolete messages, reboot it,
- check blacklists and spam filters of the device,
- remove third-party software for working with SMS installed on the device,
- in the case of a Multi-SIM device, make sure that this SIM card is active,
- if necessary, update the system software, or reset the device to factory settings,
- test the reception of messages by moving the SIM card to another, known to be working device.
 
If you have any other questions, feel free to contact us again.

Thank you for your understanding.

SMS detailed (chat):
Thank you for your response.
 
The actual absence of messages on your phone with a positive delivery status is possible mainly in the following cases:
- A phone filter has been triggered, blocking messages from a specific sender;
- You have activated an operator service that blocks commercial traffic.
 
We can recommend you:
- check your device for failures, reboot it,
- clear the device memory from obsolete messages, reboot it,
- check blacklists and spam filters of the device,
- remove third-party software for working with SMS installed on the device,
- in the case of a Multi-SIM device, make sure that this SIM card is active,
- if necessary, update the system software, or reset the device to factory settings,
- test the reception of messages by moving the SIM card to another, known to be working device.

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out to us. We will be more than happy to help you.

Thank you for your understanding

Card verification or 3DSecure decline (e:
Dear Customer,

Thank you for reaching out to Paysend Customer Support.

Your transfer XXXXXXX was declined because you did not verify your card or have not confirmed this transfers with 3DSecure protocol.

In order to verify your card, Paysend will debit a small amount (between 0.50 and 2.50 USD) from the card provided. If you have enabled SMS notifications from your online banking you will receive a text message or app notification with the amount charged (for example, VISA4722 04.08.17 $1.25 debited, where 125 would be the checksum).

If SMS notifications are not enabled, you need to access your online banking, open your transaction history, and find the amount debited by Paysend or call your bank and check this information if it doesn’t appear in the online bank statement.

To verify your card you need to:
1. Log into the account of the card you entered and look at your most recent and/or pending transactions.
2. Find the transaction from Paysend debited from your account - the transaction amount should be between 0.50 and 2.50 USD.
3. Write down the exact amount, then come back here. Click “Verify card” and enter the exact amount. It’s that easy!

Note: You need to complete this process within 12 hours, otherwise your transfer will be cancelled.

Once you've completed this process, or in the case you were not able to do it within the 12 hour period, the verification amount should be credited back to your card within 3-5 business days.

If you have verified your card for this transfer please note that you have to complete 3DSecure protocol for each transfer you make.

When initiating transfers or any other online payments with your bank card, you need to confirm them with a 3DS passcode. The code is normally sent by the bank as an SMS-message. If you didn't receive the code, please, contact your bank to figure out if the 3-D Secure technology is set up for your card. If it is activated, ask them if there is an issue with receiving SMS-messages from the bank. You can also contact your mobile carrier to find out if there are pending messages from the bank.

Please note that the 3DS page is also opened by your bank.

Unconfirmed transfers are canceled automatically within an hour.
Waiting for documents (chat):

Waiting for documents (email):
Dear Customer,

Thank you for your response.

We will be patiently waiting for your documents.

You can provide them here in chat or via email at help@paysend.com at your convenience.
What is 3DSecure:
3D Secure (Three-Domain Secure) is an online payment security protocol designed to provide an additional layer of authentication for online card transactions. It is used to ensure that a purchase is being made by the legitimate cardholder.
After making the transfer you will receive an SMS message with the security code you need to enter in the pop-up window in the app. This procedure keeps your card and funds safe.
What is CVV:
The CVV (Card Verification Value) is a security feature for credit or debit card transactions, providing increased protection against fraud. The CVV is a 3- or 4-digit code found on credit and debit cards. On Visa and MasterCard bank cards, the CVV is a 3-digit code located on the back of the card, usually to the right of the signature strip.
You need to enter this code in the CVV section when you make the transaction from your card.

6013 (chat):
I know it may be frustrating but we need to check a few details with you. As a Financial Services company, we have to abide by the rules and regulations of the industry. This helps protect the security of all our customers' accounts. 

To help speed things up, we kindly ask you to send us the following:

1) a selfie photo where you can be seen clearly holding one of the following documents, all information in the document should be legible:

· International passport;
· National ID card;
· Full driving license (non-provisional type).

If the document is double-sided, please make sure to send an additional photo of the other side of your document.
All edges and corners of your document should be entirely visible.

2) a bank statement for the card XXXXXXX transfer where we will see:

• the card holder's name;
• the last four digits of the card and/or Paysend payments (if there are any).

3) the purpose of your transfer. 

The most secure way to provide these details is via our in-app chat or web-based chat at help.paysend.com. Alternatively, you can send them to cs@paysend.com. If you do send us an email, please make sure to mention your mobile phone number in its title.

Thank you in advance.

6024 (AP):
Based on our internal policies we must make sure that the card which was used as a funding source belongs to you.
Please reply to this message with:

1. the purpose/reason for the transfer(s);

2. a current photo of your face (selfie) with any one of the following documents:

• Current signed passport;
• National ID card with a photo (both sides of the document);
• Full driving licence (both sides, non-provisional type).

All information in the document should be legible. 
All edges and corners of your document should be entirely visible.

3. a screenshot from your Apple Pay wallet app. The screenshot should contain the last 4 digits of the card number and the number of your virtual account;

• the card holder's name,
• the last four digits of the card and/or Paysend payments (if there are any).

Thank you in advance.

6071 macro (chat):
Hello!

Thank you for contacting us.

For your safety and security, we need to verify some information.
Once this is done, you may be able to resume sending transfers. 

To help us protect you and your account, and to prevent your account from being closed, please reply to this message with the following information:
•  Complete bank statement in PDF format for the last month (make sure all pages of the bank statement are included)
•  Estimate of your expected money transfer activity for the upcoming month, including how much and to how many people you expect to send money. (e.g., $300 to my mom, $600 to my sister)
•  Please specify your occupation/industry (engineer/health professional etc.)
•  Specify the relationship and purpose of sending money for each recipient of yours. The more details you share the better we will be able to help you. (e.g., Michael Jones, Father, to help buy medicine and pay rent)

Please provide us with the requested information within the next 10 days to avoid your account being closed.

We appreciate your business and want to ensure that we are following the appropriate guidelines in the countries where we operate to keep your money safe and secure. 

Any information you provide to us will always be kept strictly confidential.

Please do not change the subject of this message when sending your reply.

Thank you in advance.

Hello!

Thank you for contacting us.

Unfortunately, we can not generate a bank statement-like document with reports from all your transactions.
However, you can get a receipt for every transaction you have made using our service.

You can download a transfer receipt from the website paysend.com (http://paysend.com) or the Paysend mobile app.

To do so, please log in and navigate to Transaction History. Then select the transfer you are interested in, click on the three dots in the upper right corner and click the "Get receipt" option. You will be prompted to enter the email address to which the receipt will be sent.

We apologize for the inconvenience this might have caused you.

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out to us. We will be more than happy to help you.

Thank you for your understanding
Reconsider acc cancelation (chat):
Thank you for your response.

After reviewing your profile, I noticed that you are one of our long-time users who have access to multi-currency cards and accounts in our service.

You can order a virtual or a plastic prepaid Mastercard card in your Paysend account.
You can generate and access your virtual card details on the app and use it to make online payments. Please note that you will need to go through the verification procedure (upload an identification document) before you can get a virtual card.
A plastic card can be ordered on the app and used to make online payments, in-store purchases and to withdraw cash.

However, this option is no longer available for new Paysend users. If you decide to delete your account and choose to come back in the future, this option will not be available to you anymore.

Would you like to reconsider your request for account deletion or shall we proceed with it?

Thank you in advance.

Address correction (email):
Dear customer,

Thank you for using Paysend!

In order to complete your account verification, please specify your full current residence address in your registration country in the following format:
Country, city, full street name and number, country code.

If you have any questions regarding our services or this procedure, please let us know.

Thank you in advance.
Usualy within minutes (chat):
Thank you for your response.

We transfer money to over 100 countries and regularly add new ones to our platform. Our aim is to make money transfers simple, instant & accessible in a way that suits you.
 
Most transfers are sent within minutes, and funds usually arrive at your recipient’s card, account, or digital wallet in just within minutes. However, some financial institutions are still updating their systems to support these new technologies and may need more time to process incoming transfers.
 
The delivery time is set by the recipient’s bank or wallet provider and may take up to 3 business days.
Can't cancel tx: Unfortunately, manual cancelling of any transaction is not possible in Paysend, neither by the user nor by Paysend. Any processing of cancellations and refunds, or reversals, are automatic should the transaction hit an error.

AP screenshot block (email):
Dear Customer,

Thank you for your response.

Looks like the security option on your Apple Pay does not allow the screenshot of the token and card number to be taken.
We kindly ask you to disable this security option and take the screenshot again. If you are not sure where to find the option to disable this feature we kindly ask you to reach out to Apple Pay support.

Alternatively, you can take a photo of the screen with another device and send us as a response to this email.

Thank you in advance.

This should resolve the issue.

Full transfer data hidden (chat):
Thank you for your response.

You can find all the information about the transfer in the transaction receipt.  
  
You can download a transfer receipt from the website paysend.com (http://paysend.com) or the Paysend mobile app.

To do so, please log in and navigate to Transaction History. Then select the transfer you are interested in, click on the three dots in the upper right corner and click the "Get receipt" option. You will be prompted to enter the email address to which the receipt will be sent.  
  
The full bank account number or card number is encrypted and the part of the card number is hidden. This is the part of our system we can not disable since it ensures that private data is stored securely.
